name: stampr
description: Simple REST API to send postal mail online.  Create and send batches or single mailings.  Built-in templating via mustache and variable data (mail merge). Each mailing can be up to five pages and is printed in full color.

apis.name: stampr API
apis.description: Simple REST API to send postal mail online.  Create and send batches or single mailings.  Built-in templating via mustache and variable data (mail merge). Each mailing can be up to five pages and is printed in full color.
